Module com.example.addressbook
Package com.example.addressbook.SQL

Interface IScreenTimeEntryDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
SqliteScreenTimeEntryDAO
public interface IScreenTimeEntryDAO
This class is used to handle the screen time entry data access object

      Add or update a screen time entry
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user
      applicationName - The name of the application
      duration - The duration of the screen time entry
      dateTime - The date and time of the screen time entry

      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs

    • getWeeklyScreenTimeByUserId

      Map<DayOfWeek,Long> getWeeklyScreenTimeByUserId(int userId, LocalDate startOfWeek) throws SQLException
      Get the weekly screen time by user id
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user
      startOfWeek - The start of the week
      Returns:
      A map of the day of the week and the total screen time

      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs
